text: Name: mary mary E-Mail: mary.mary@gmail.com Address: Moscow, Russia Github: https://github.com/mary LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/mary Phone No. 541476198075 SUMMARY Having 7+ years of experience in Network Engineering and Administration.
